Uses of Package
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support

Packages that use org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support
org.activebpel.rt.bpel This package contains classes for creating a BPEL model and for implements a standalone BPEL engine for testing designs. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.visitors Classes implementing the Visitor pattern used to perform various functions on the activity definitions.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl This package contains the base classes used in the implementation model for the BPEL activities. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity This package contains classes used in the implementation model for the BPEL activities. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support Includes supporting bpel objects which aren't properly activities.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.wsio.consume Provides interfaces and classes for consuming WSDL message data by BPEL activities and other supporting objects (e.g., invoke activity, receive activity, and onEvent element of a pick activity).  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.storage Classes related to saving and restoring the state of processes.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.visitors Classes that visit a tree of BPEL implementation objects and save or restore their state.  
 

Classes in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support used by org.activebpel.rt.bpel
IAeCompensationCallback
          Interface for the invoker of a scope's compensation method.
 

Classes in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support used by org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.visitors
AeIMACorrelations.IAeCorrelationSetFilter
          Filters the correlation sets used to produce set of paths for conflictingReceives test.
AeLink
          Models the links that are defined within a flow.
 

Classes in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support used by org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl
AeCompensationHandler
          Models the compensateHandler that is part of a scope or process.
AeCompInfo
          An AeCompInfo object represents a single successful execution of a scope activity.
AeCorrelationSet
          Models a correlationSet defined as part of a scope or process.
AeLink
          Models the links that are defined within a flow.
AeOpenMessageActivityInfo
          Contains information about an inbound open message activities that have been consumed by a receiver such as the BPEL Receive or OnMessage, but not responded to.
AeScopedObject
          Implements a convenience base class for implementation objects that are bound to a scope.
IAeCompensationCallback
          Interface for the invoker of a scope's compensation method.

IAeLoopActivity
          An interface for containers that loop.
